import BookingPage from "./pages/BookingPage" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Params } from "react-router-dom" import { UrlHistory } from "@remix-run/router/dist/history"; export default function RoomIntro(props){ const history = useHistory(); history.push('/bookingpage'); const handleButtonClick = () => { history.push(`/RoomDT/${id}/BKPage`); } return(
